metadata.title: USN-6654-1 -- Roundcube Webmail vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that Roundcube Webmail incorrectly sanitized characters in the linkrefs text messages. An attacker could possibly use this issue to execute a cross-site scripting (XSS) attack. (CVE-2023-43770)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6654-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  roundcube-pgsql - 1.6.2+dfsg-1ubuntu0.1 roundcube-mysql - 1.6.2+dfsg-1ubuntu0.1 roundcube-plugins - 1.6.2+dfsg-1ubuntu0.1 roundcube - 1.6.2+dfsg-1ubuntu0.1 roundcube-core - 1.6.2+dfsg-1ubuntu0.1 roundcube-sqlite3 - 1.6.2+dfsg-1ubuntu0.1 No subscription required
